text:
Hi.
I apologize if I am not being precise enough. 
I am trying to build httpd-2.0.39 on an alpha system, linux 
gcc version 2.96
cpu                     : Alpha
cpu model               : EV56
Linux version 2.2.17 

I have configured with

 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache2 --with-perl

make dies on

make[1]: Entering directory `/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/support'
make[2]: Entering directory `/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/support'
/bin/sh /chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=link
gcc  -g -O2 -pthread    -DLINUX=2 -D_REENTRANT -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500 -D_BSD_SOURCE
-D_SVID_SOURCE -D_GNU_SOURCE -DAP_HAVE_DESIGNATED_INITIALIZER  
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr/include
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/include
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib -I.
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/os/unix
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/server/mpm/prefork
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/modules/http
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/modules/filters
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/modules/proxy
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/include
-I/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/modules/dav/main -export-dynamic
-L/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib   -o htpasswd 
htpasswd.lo    /chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/pcre/libpcre.la
/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/libaprutil.la -lgdbm -ldb
/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib/libexpat.la
/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr/libapr.la -lm -lcrypt -lnsl -ldl
libtool: link: warning: library `/usr/lib/libgdbm.la' was moved.
libtool: link: warning: library `/usr/lib/libgdbm.la' was moved.
/usr/bin/ld: warning: type and size of dynamic symbol `__gmon_start__' are not
defined
/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/.libs/libaprutil.so: undefined
reference to `db_create'
/chi21/marinari/DIS/httpd-2.0.39/srclib/apr-util/.libs/libaprutil.so: undefined
reference to `db_strerror'
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [htpasswd] Error 1

thanks 

regards

enzo marinari
creator: enzo.marinari@roma1.infn.it
trawick@apache.org
text:
A few things that might be useful to try:

see if it builds okay if you add --disable-berkeley-db to your
configure options

install a private copy of berkeleydb and point to that with

  --enable-berkeley-db=/path/to/your/private/copy

and see if it works...  note that if you use db-4.1.x you'll need
to grab the latest apr-util

for the failure scenario, show the portion of configure output which 
shows which db libraries were detected

for the failure scenario, try it with the lastest code
no response from submitter since November
creator: trawick@apache.org
kevin@bantamtech.com
text:
I've had this problem on Windows since 2.0.49. I use the w32updatedb.pl script
to update apr-util to use Berkeley DB 4.2.52, and I get nearly the same error:

undefined reference to `_db_strerror'
undefined reference to `_db_create'

If I do not use the w32updatedb.pl script to link apr-util to BDB, it compiles,
but the goal is BDB support for mod_dav_svn (Subversion).

I was able to compile 2.0.49 against the same BDB libraries without error.

I'm using VC++.NET 2003 on Windows XP.
*** Bug 18422 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
jorton@redhat.com
